name: Hunchy
description: An unlicensed Hunchback clone, this one stays close to its source material, having you make Quasimodo run and jump through a medieval side-scrolling set in order to rescue Esmeralda. Though it's lacking the Tarzan-like rope-swinging and the pursuing soldier who enforces the time limit in other versions, its 25 levels boast an ample set of conventional Hunchbackian threats -- rolling rocks and guards' thrusting pikes to jump over, arrows to duck under, and an exceptional menace relatively unknown in medieval Paris: ominous drops of acid rain. As you proceed you will get to risk them one at a time, and eventually, following the classic Hunchback formula, all together.

shot.caption: Just so you know what's coming...
The demo mode will preview all 25 levels for you, each more unfairly difficult than the last.
These rocks keep on rolling right along without requiring any trace of a slope.  There must be gyroscopes involved.
